channel.title: Assignments on DATA 1030

item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: Assignment 1: Computer Science Due Date: Monday, September 18, 2017 at 10 pm This assignment goes over essential computer science topics and software engineering practices with applications to data science. Make sure to clone your Classroom repository and install Pycharm before lab on Tuesday. Tuesday’s lab instructions Thursdays lab instructions Assignment 1 instructions The solutions for Tuesday’s lab notebook are here: Tuesday’s lab solutions As another reminder, you will be submitting your completed files for both the labs and assignment to your GitHub repository at a1-computer-science-<YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME>.

item.title: Assignment 0
item.description: Assignment 0: Introduction to Git, Jupyter & Pandas Due Date: will be finished during lab on Thursday, September 7, 2017 Instructions Feedback Survey
